title: Denso - global revenue 2008 to 2019
yAxis: Net sales in million Japanese yen
summary: Denso Lines 2008 sales million of 5362772 million in 2019 represents a slight increase from last Fiscal 's 5108291 million .
The Net sales million of U.S. airlines was 83.72 million in 2018 , making Denso above the average .
Denso 's sales million Net sales million is a measure of utilized available seating capacity calculated by dividing revenue Net miles by available seat miles for a reporting period .
gold: This statistic illustrates Denso 's global revenue from the fiscal year of 2008 to the fiscal year of 2019 . In the fiscal year of 2019 , Denso had global net sales of around 5.36 trillion yen ( or about 48 billion U.S. dollars ) .
